TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ArrayPrototype extends Microsoft.JScript.ArrayObject

Docs.summary: Provides static methods and properties for objects. All methods of this class are called by passing in a reference to the object that is requesting access to the method. This class belongs to the built-in object model category.
